hero.title: A project, a question?
hero.subtitle: We help you realize your project.

form.title: Leave us a message
form.subtitle: We are at your disposal and look forward to discussing your project. Do not hesitate to contact us, we will respond as soon as possible
form.email-format: You must respect the following format: example@mail.com
form.error: We have a problem sending your message. We apologize for the inconvenience. You can try again or send directly to the address : contact@ubidreams.com
form.success: Your message has been sent, thank you for your confidence, we will get back to you as soon as possible.
form.captcha-invalid: You must validate the reCaptcha to confirm the submission of the form.
